Text: L Ron Hubbard was a smart dude. He played all those people and convinced them all this scientology bull crap. I cant believed people follow this guy. He is idolized. I cant believe this. Well Jesus must have started off this way, convincing people of wack ideas. Maybe in 2000 years this dude will be considered the son of god.
gecko52: I can't envision the son of god with an ascot, a captain's hat and his own yacht, no matter how many millennia pass.
alls im saying is that the hype on this guy is way out of wack. maybe jesus was a bad example. but the fact is this guy is being idolized for making up a bunch of bull honkey.
